metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35042 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Django 3.1.x before 3.1.13 and 3.2.x before 3.2.5 allows QuerySet.order_by SQL injection if order_by is untrusted input from a client of a web application.

notes.Note: sbeattie> all django 2.x versions are not affected because deprecation changes that removed the column format validation were not applied to the 2.x versions. introduced by 513948735b ("Fixed #31426 -- Added proper field validation to QuerySet.order_by().") upstream

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
